scripts.package:build: npx tsc --project tsconfig.json && (cd ./migrations && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts)
scripts.package:unbuild: rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts && (cd ./migrations && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts)
scripts.package:publish: npm run package:build; npm publish --access public; npm run package:unbuild
scripts.test: export HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; DEBUG='deepcase:*' npx jest
scripts.migrate: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='deepcase:*' npx migrate up --compiler='ts:@deepcase/hasura/compiler/index.js'
scripts.unmigrate: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='deepcase:*' npx migrate down --compiler='ts:@deepcase/hasura/compiler/index.js'
